name: Life is Strange

next_episode_to_air.overview: TBA - The episode revolves around Max Caulfield testing her power and reuniting with her old best friend, Chloe Price.

overview: Life Is Strange is a digital television series produced by Legendary Digital Studios and dj2, based on the 2015 adventure game, Life Is Strange, created and developed by French game developper, DONTNOD Entertainment. The digital series is currently in production and with no release date announced.
